title: affordable 1 bed 1 bath Condo in an upscale LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING
description:
1101 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19107
affordable 1 bed 1 bath Condo in an upscale LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING with 24 hour Concierge / Security and VERY LOW CONDO FEES in the centrally located and sought after neighborhood of Washington Square West in downtown Philadelphia. The historic Western Union Building featuring Beaux Arts style of the time, was originally built 100 years ago as the headquarters of Western Union Telegraph Company, and was beautifully and tastefully expanded and redesigned  into a luxury 12- story boutique residence by Philadelphia's renowned architect Cecile Baker in 2008. The unit itself: Nestled on the 5th floor (enabling you to take the steps OR the elevator which many people like), this very quiet spot faces the courtyard, giving it an air of peace and tranquility. Upon entering, you will note the quaint foyer, which acts as a buffer to the main living area on one side and the bedroom and bath on the other (which isn't alway the case with these size condos) . You will fall for its souring ceilings and  large windows (which make the unit feel more spacious), open floor plan, modern kitchen and solid hardwood flooring! The bedroom is plenty big for a king, and boasts a large walk in closet. There is a coat closet and an in unit Washer/Dryer included in the sale. A perfect first time purchase, downsize purchase, or pied de terre for someone looking for the convenience, luxury, security and peace of mind of a full service Center City building where PARKING IS AVAILABLE ON SITE for an extra monthly fee. The low condo fee includes water, sewer, gas cooking, a fitness center, and a courtyard  with a private secure dog run. One of the great things about Wash West is its central location: less than 7 blocks in any direction to most of the great neighborhoods , historic squares and parks of Philadelphia: walkable to beautiful Washington Square and Rittenhouse Square, to the vibrant arts district on Broad St, to Restaurant Row; an easy walk to the center city business district and neighborhoods like Old City, Bella Vista, Queen Village and the Italian Market, all offering award winning dining, shopping and nightlife - and very close to public transportation and Jefferson Hospital!

Brand new home, just completed! 4bd, 3ba, over 2,500 sq ft in Point Breeze built by custom home builder Lily Development. This home is 3 stories with a finished basement (4 floors) and 3 outdoor spaces (roof deck, master bedroom balcony, and patio) and custom designed finishes throughout. Enter into your home with an open floor layout with plenty of space for entertaining, ample room for a formal dining room, living room, breakfast nook, and kitchen. Floating steel steps leads to the second floor which includes two ample bedrooms a large full bathroom, a double-bowl sink vanity, and tub. On the third floor you've entered the beautiful master suite with voluminous light coming from all directions. The master bathroom is completely outfitted with his and her sinks, stand alone soaking tub, and separate glass enclosed shower, you'll feel like it's a day at the spa. The master bedroom includes a walk in closet with a balcony off the bedroom. Just outside of the master bedroom there is a wet-bar with sink, mini-fridge, and cabinetry. Follow the steel spiral stairs upstairs to the roof deck with 360 degree views of the city. A great space for entertaining and enjoying the city views! Full sized washer and dryer located in the basement next to the living room and lower level bedroom and full bathroom. Over sized layout, wide open spaces, large rooms with tons of closets. Easy walking to public transportation, Center City, University City, the area's hospitals, and Passyunk Square. Ideal location and free parking on the street. title: Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling!
description:
Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with a private balcony and parking in Center City. Spanning 1,264 square feet, this lovely sun-splashed condo invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full second bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife, and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel, and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes away. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station, and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are from when the unit was previously staged.

Neighborhood
Washington Square West:
Easy walk to a wide variety of shopping, restaurants, and sites, including Acme market, Whole Foods, Starbucks, The Magic Garden as well as Walnut, Market and South Street.
Just steps away are medical and educational facilities of Jefferson, University of Pennsylvania, Wills Eye, and Pennsylvania Hospitals, University of the Arts, Temple, and Avenue of the Arts theaters.
Close Public Transportation, including buses, subway and Patco lines. Plenty of off-street parking options available.

title: updated 4 bedroom bedroom 2 bath modern Cape Cod
description:
When you enter this home, you will feel like you have stepped into your very own private oasis. This lovely expanded and updated 4 bedroom bedroom 2 bath modern Cape Cod single is  located on a quiet Wyndmoor street and offers a versatile and livable floor plan.  The renovated open eat-in kitchen has great working space and plenty of cabinet space. Just beyond the kitchen is a lovely living room with walls of windows and sliders to the back deck and an adjoining dining room.The living room has wonderful built-in bookcases and a wood burning fireplace. Two bedrooms (one currently serves as a den), wonderful closet space and a newly renovated  bathroom complete the first floor.  Upstairs you will find 2 spacious bedrooms, an updated hall bathroom and a storage/utility room.  This home is a feel good space and offers, newer windows, laminate flooring in some rooms, newer bathrooms, expanded closets , new paver outdoor entryway and so much more. Wait until you see the outdoor spaces of this home! A private escape with an amazing awning covered patio and deck, a newer in-ground pool and an outdoor screened in room which is perfect for storage, food prep and much more. The location of this home is everything, with walkability to Wyndmoor's business district, Septa Regional Rail Wyndmoor Station and close to local treasures like Woodmere Art Museum, the Wissahickon and The Morris Arboretum. Summer is just around the corner…you will be able to enjoy the pool and outdoor spaces of this special home. Credit Score Check by Owner Method.

title: @@Lovely 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom home  for rent@@
description:
Welcome to Pheasant Lane, a beautiful Rancher located in the highly desirable town of Oreland tucked back in a quiet neighborhood offering the best of suburban living in the award-winning Springfield School District! This lovely 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom home boasts an eye-catching front yard highlighted by manicured landscaping and a blooming dogwood tree. Inside, you'll find numerous upgrades and features that make this home truly special and move-in ready, including central A/C, new stainless-steel appliances, new hot water heater (2021), new roof (2021), 6-panel doors throughout with new black matte doorknobs, pull-down stairs to the attic for extra storage, Pella windows and doors, LED recessed lighting throughout with 20-year bulbs, newer siding, fresh neutral paint throughout, upgraded electrical to 200 amp, and so much more! The first level is adorned with luxury laminate floors and is filled with an abundance of natural light through the open floor plan. The living room makes a great first impression with a beautiful wood-burning  stove, luxury laminate floors, recessed lighting, crown molding, and a large sliding door leading to the new back deck, bringing in lots of sunlight. As you enter the home, a convenient powder room is situated to your left. To your right, a pocket door from the living room leads to 3 nice-sized bedrooms sharing a hall bathroom with tile tub/shower. Toward the back of the home, the kitchen showcases sparkling stainless-steel Samsung and Whirlpool appliances (brand new microwave, brand new oven, new dishwasher, and new refrigerator), luxury laminate floors, gas cooking, recessed lighting, tile backsplash, and a breakfast area providing a convenient place to dine and enjoy meals together. The large family room offers additional living space, luxury laminate floors, and recessed lighting.  The laundry area with a washer, gas dryer, and washtub completes your tour inside. Step outback and picture hosting future summer barbeques on the back deck and campfires around the firepit while watching kids and pets play in the spacious backyard. Start planning your gardening projects and outdoor excursions because there’s plenty of space for storage in the backyard shed and storage area at the front of the converted garage. This home is ideally located near parks, train stations with access to Center City, golf courses, schools, restaurants, and major routes such as the PA-Turnpike and Rte. 309!

title: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate
description: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate Hospital have to offer, this spacious, cheerful, and charming 1 BR/1.5 ba condo offers a quiet respite from the city, with unique features including a huge private basement that doubles your space for storage, office, workshop, gym, or whatever you'd like to create. Vestibule opens to an open plan living area with hardwood floors, high ceilings, crown molding, built ins, space for a dining table, and even a gas fireplace for chilly days and nights. The open kitchen with island seating features a gas range, granite counters, stainless appliances, and a window over the sink to let the sunlight in. There's even a powder room for guests as well. The master bedroom has double closets with storage above, and a private en suite bath with tub and shower. Off the bedroom, you'll find a small and lovely private patio for your morning coffee or drinks to unwind after a long day. The private basement is nearly as large as the unit itself, and includes front loading washer/dryer & Bilco door to the street to bring in any large items or bicycles, etc. Low condo fees and incredible location make this a smart buy. Short walk to Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill Trail, and U City/Penn/CHOP. Everything you could imagine is right outside your door: boutiques, coffee, farmers markets, gym, groceries, restaurants are all within steps. Greenfield catchment.

title: 10 1 BEDROOM UNITS IN PORT RICHMOND
description:
PORT RICHMOND NEW CONSTRUCTION! Available for May 15 / June 1 (possibly sooner) are 10 brand new 1 bedroom units, thoughtfully designed to optimize living / storage space, maximize daylight with massive windows in every unit, walk-in closets, soaking tubs and so much charm. Each unit also has a balcony and the 1st floor unit has a private yard. Please see bottom of listing for more specific unit info. Price range is $1500-$1850.
From the design team at A-Frame Constructs comes a "well crafted, historically contextual new construction, with a red brick facade and tall loft style paneled windows". This from a recent write-up in Yimby "A Neo-Industrial building that pays homage to the area's historical heritage with it's tall ceilings, paneled floor-to-ceiling windows, a red brick facade, and black metal accents. Arches above the fourth-story windows and at the screens framing the shallow street facing-balconies add a triumphant flair of Rundbogenstil to the composition."
A-Frame Constructs are the people behind Martha, Sally, The Lunar Inn, Tiny's bottle Shop, Zig-Zag BBQ, Pizza Shackamaxon, plus many design driven residential properties.
Located on the main strip of Port Richmond and within a block or 2 of Reanimator Coffee, Lunar Inn Bar/Restaurant, Tiny's Bottle Shop, Launderette Records, to name a few. Many other cool shops / restaurants are just a few blocks away and Tacconelli's Pizzeria and Somerset Splits are a 5-10 minute walk. Some great Polish dining and markets are just around the corner on Allegheny Avenue as well. 1 minute drive to the 95 on-ramp, 10 minute drive to center city, 5 minute drive to Fishtown. Richmond Street has recently undergone an amazing transformation, and soon the Girard Avenue trolley that currently completes it's route in Fishtown will be making stops along Richmond Street. We're pet friendly and manage our own properties. Feel free to email me with any questions and to schedule a showing.
Amenities include:
central air
dishwasher
walk-in closets
stone countertops
washer/dryer in unit
custom shelving
soaking tubs
natural light
balconies
pre-wired for Comcast
Units are well insulated including a layer of sound homasote (sound barrier) between floors as well as double layer of sheet rock between apartments.
FRONT UNITS: There are a total of 6 front facing units, these have incredible living room light with floor-ceiling windows, bedroom walk-in closet, and a small narrow balcony. $1500 (600sq ft)
REAR UNITS: There are a total of 3 rear facing units, these have an additional closet in addition to the walk-in closet, kitchen islands which can accommodate stool seating, and larger balconies which can fit a small cafe table and 2 chairs and a huge picture window in the bedroom. $1650 (600 sq ft)

description:
This beautiful 4 bed, 3 bath town home was renovated in 2015 and is move-in ready. Enter through the extra-large front patio area and into the enormous living area where you will be greeted with high ceilings, recessed lighting and dark hardwood floors throughout. The living area showcases an elegant gas fireplace with custom v-stone surroundings. Towards the rear is the huge eat-in kitchen with custom cabinetry, a large island, wine cooler, glass tile backsplash and quartz counter tops. The kitchen also comes equipped with all top of the line, stainless steel appliances! On the second floor are two large bedrooms each with closets including custom shelving and drawers, as well as a shared full hall bath with soaking tub and dual vanity. In the hallway is an a convenienty located laundry room with full sized washer/dryer and granite counter top for folding and upper cabinet space. Take a short trip up to the third floor master suite which includes a wet bar with wine cooler, his & hers closets space, a large bedroom area with a front facing deck and beautiful skyline views. The ensuite bathroom has a large shower with handheld spray showerhead, a large soaking tub, Badoglio marble on the floor and walls and dual vanities with marble tops. Don't forget the large fiberglass roof deck with gas line for grilling, outdoor speakers and unbeatable 360 degree views of Philadelphia. Last but not least is the full finished basement! Your basement space features a living area with custom shelving and wet bar with wine cooler, sink and quartz counter top. There is also a fourth bedroom accompanied by a full bathroom and shower with frameless glass enclosure. Additionally, your home comes prepared with in-ceiling speakers throughout, video intercom system, window treatments, back patio area and dual zoned HVAC. Located in Graduate Hospital, one of the most vibrant neighborhoods in the city, you will be in proximity to shopping, restaurants and schools. Don't miss you chance to rent this once of a kind home!
